verses.1: Pilna in a inn lam a, a innkhuampi sagih a phut hi.
verses.2: Amah in pawi bawl dingin sa go-in leenggahzu khaih a, annek nading sabuai a bawl hi.
verses.3: Khua sung mun sang khempeuh panin mi a sam dingin a nasem numeite sawl a,
verses.4: “Thu thei lote aw, hong pai un,” ci-in samsak a, mihaite kiangah,
verses.5: “Hong pai unla, ka an huan sa ne-in, ka bawl sa leenggahzu hong dawn un.
verses.6: Thu thei lote taisanin khansau unla, pilna lampi zui un,” cisak hi.
verses.7: Mihaite thuhilh lecin hong maizumsak dinga, migilote thuhilh lecin hong su gawp ding hi.
verses.8: Mihaite thuhilh kei in; hong mudah ding uh hi. Mipilte thuhilh in; hong it ding uh hi.
verses.9: Mipilte thuhilh lecin pil semsemna-in nei dinga, thuman mite thuhilh lecin a thutheihna uh khang semsem ding hi.
verses.10: Topa zahtakna pen pilna kipatna hi a, Siangtho Pa theihna pen thumuhna ahi hi.
verses.11: Pilna in na khang hong khan dinga, na nuntakna hong sausak ding hi.
verses.12: Pil lecin nangma phattuam nading hi a, pilna don kei lecin nangma supna ding ahi hi.
verses.13: Haina pen a kam tam, zumna mel a thei lo numei tawh kibang a,
verses.14: ama kong gei ah ahi a, a sang pen munah ahi zongin amah tu a,
verses.15: ama kiang a nawk kha, amauʼ nasep bek a phawk kimlai mite kiangah,
verses.16: “Thu thei lote aw, hong pai un,” ci-in samin, mihaite kiangah,
verses.17: “Tui dawn sim, khum diak a, an nek sim, lim diak hi,” ci hi.
verses.18: Tua lai ah a paite a sihna thu tua lai ah a lut sate sihna gam thuk sungah a om khitna thu, a khem zawh mite in phawk kha lo uh hi.
